tweet: For those of you that are upset that I posted something positive about a "competitor", all I can say is too bad. There's room for more than 1 coin. I call it as I see it. If you have been following me for a bit, you've seen that I also like Monero & Decred. Now, back to Litecoin!  https://t.co/JQrJnELGdb

@RRCool_J @ericajohnes I've looked at many and have tweeted about them. I usually call them out the way I see it in my own trolling ways. When I see something promising like Monero, Decred, and now Nano, I give them credit.
Argh. Now that @aantonop has acknowledged that Monero might be useful I have to stop trolling him.  https://t.co/lwS2M8FZ8i

Blender Foundation accepts Bitcoin Cash donations since yesterday, already 14 people donated - in total 0.63 BCH (800 USD). Thanks awesome anonymous people! Added Monero now too:  https://t.co/ENtdLYZtwc #b3d

@cyrilthecypherp @ZeusZissou @rusty_twit @adam3us @peterktodd If the question is could Bitcoin surpass Monero's privacy at it exists today: probably. Will Bitcoin be able to surpass research projects of that time: probably not. And that is fine.
